content.detailedDescription:
I was called outside my house by my girlfriend who was in the front yard. pointing to the sww she asked a friend of ours who was visiting with us are those what you saw. 
   previously our friend had called us on the 15th around 7:30pm and had told us that he had just seen 4 bright red lights rapidly descend silently straight down from very high altitude to roughly 1000ft. slightly nww of him. he was in his back yard 3 blocks away. he said that they all appeared to be disk like with a reflective metallic surface that emitted a red light from the bottom with one emitting what he thought to be short vapor trails. he said they then paused briefly 2-3 sec. then 3 took off to the sww with unbelievable speed and vanished. then the one with the c. trails quickly followed suit.  
  
   when i looked i saw about 8-10 red lights in a random pattern with varied brightness levels. the group was silent and appeared to be getting closer. i did a check of the rest of the sky and there were no other aircraft in the sky. that is very rare for this area. our friend said "yep that's them, now you know i'm not crazy" i pulled out my phone and was trying to take some pictures. 1-2 minutes later they all appeared to have stopped approaching. 5-7 min. later as the clouds were about to start to obscure our view and i was thinking to myself "flairs on balloons" i saw a brighter red light approaching up towards them from low on the horizon from the west. it was silent and traveling very fast and slowed to a stop in the middle of the group it's color becoming less bright as it did. "definitely not flairs on balloons" i thought. my neighbors then came out and caught a glimpse just as the clouds were covering our view. 5 min. later from the east traveling nw a helicopter flew by rather low with an unusual light pattern of many red lights with the top one rotating. it clearly wasn't what we were looking at earlier . about 20-30 min. later the clouds rolled away and the lights were gone. i could see and hear a few jets but not as many as usual. 

 this event was almost identical to the news coverage i saw from 1/1/08.
content.summary: Group of 8 to 10 bright red lights moving over the city of san diego.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from doctor in apollo pa, noticed what at first thought was a cell tower or some sort but the came to realize that there was no bottom to the structure, it was just lights like car lights hovering above gas station. did not take time to stop. too eerie of a feeling so i kept driving.
object was approx 100 ft off ground hovering, no sound, lights were not blinking. didnt see a shape to object just the 3-4 lights. it was almost what a helicopter would look like if it had 4 lights across bottom and was city on top of a building not moving basiccally,.
content.summary: Lights hovering above gas station.

content.detailedDescription: Hello.This past week, i believe it was tues november 25, i caught the tail end of a show on discovery where mufon was discussing a case w a woman named denise and trying to verify what she said.  at the end there was an illustration that appeared similar to an experience i had a few years ago. at the time i called nasa to report it, but never got any response. i'm sure they either thought i was a kook or i had discovered something they wanted to remain secret about.  my experience resembled the sparkly glittery that fell to the trees of this woman's property. it was the illustration at the end that triggered me to want to contact you. it was the first time i ever saw anything similar to what i experienced enough to consider speaking up about it. i don't remember the exact dates but i could likely figure it out. i think the summer of 2002. i was traveling from salt lake city to telluride for a mountain bike/climbing festival and we had left around 10 pm, arriving at moab 2 am ish. it was nice out so we were camping out under the stars at a location i used to camp at outside of canyonlands national park. its not an official camp site, and actually now has a no camping sign there, but has a direct veiw to the monitor and merimack. we'd laid down our sleeping bags and were trying to fall asleep. i was staring up into the sky and watching the stars. i saw what would have resembled in sorts what this woman denise described happened in her yard. i would describe it similar, in that it was glittery, but it was almost like a beam of glittery if that makes sense. it blended into the night sky and stars but was also very distinguishable from it. at the time, i felt like i was being "probed" laying face up and actually turned my body to the side because i was uncomfortable. i thought it bizzare as it was both vague but very real.  the next morning as we were driving to breakfast i eventually commented that i had a strange experience the night before and my friend excitedly said she did too, and described pretty much the same thing. she didn't turn away from the "probing" tho like i did. she just kept watching it. it really was like a glittery beam for lack of a better way to describe it. i've always wondered about it, thought maybe it was some new secret weapon or instrument seeking data. i considered that we were in the desert and had a heat signiture that was different than anything else surrounding us, so that would likely be why there seemed to be a focus on us in particular.  anyway, i thought it might be useful to speak up to support what this woman saw, and in case there is any value in it for your research. i tought it might be good to have it documented since someone else had a similar experience.Thank you.
content.summary: Glittery beam.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving south on rt19 toward washington, pa when i noticed the lights at first i thought they were plane's, we pulled into aldi's parking lot my wife went in to buy some things i stayed in the car watching the lights they were not moving, you could see small plane's flying what looked like below the object's in the driection of the washington co. airport. when my wife came back to the car i showed her the lights were still there, she didn't know what to think but she wasn't convinced (she doesn't believe in ufo's). we went to eat-n-park after dinner we went to walmart same location as where i was watching the light's and they weren't there,there wasn't any more cloud cover these light's just weren't there. do you have any other report's? feel free to contact me if you need to by cell phone.
content.summary: 2 stationary objects (bright lights).

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from thanksgiving dinner with my wife and son from tullytown to levittown, pa.

while we were leaving my inlaws home, i noticed two bright lights in the sky that were very apparent because the sky was extremely clear.

i commented initially as a joke to my wife that there was a ufo because she knows i am fascinated by them and she has zero interest. 

i immediately noticed and remarked to her that it may very well be. she laughed but i couldn't keep my eyes off of these two lights as we drove home (5 minutes away). i am not perfect with estimating distance but i can assure you these lights were far larger than planes (which i saw many of and all sizes) flying around the sky. the top light was about the size and brightness of the north star while the bottom light (which was offset to the right a little) was about twice as large/bright. fwiw-the lights were in the south sky...I'm guessing around philly or so because i did see planes coming out of the airport area to the right of the lights (it was that clear!)

i was really intrigued so i bundled up and stood outside to watch them. i tried to photograph it but my cameras really suck in the dark (of course right?). i stood outside for about 30 minutes watching these two lights not moving at all. they did not change position, brightness or size for that entire time. for the next 20-25 minutes the lights seemed to descend or maybe head further south very slowly. they gradually dropped into a tree line but i could still see them through the tree (sometimes only one) the entire time. eventually they were not visible for me (i thought about going on the roof...Lol) so i went inside. 

i spoke to my mom and she told me about the discovery episode on ufo's which i guess focused on bucks county so i started to look to see if there was any other evidence or documentation of these lights but only saw triangular disc sightings were noted. hopefully someone else had spotted these same lights tonight and can share their insights.
content.summary: Two star like objects that remained together and stationary for 45min before moving.

content.detailedDescription:
According to my grandson (11 yrs), he and 3 friends were out at about 7:00 p.M. on 11-26-08, and saw a large object overhead hovering, making no sound.  it was triangular in shape, had lights.  it was accompanied by a sphere of light which bounced around it.  they all took off quickly.  the triangular object was about 80 ft off the ground and was about 40 ft wide.  casey made pictures of these objects.  i believe he said they were pursued by jets.  we live close to the willow grove naval air base.  i know casey was telling the truth as he saw it, and the friends can confirm it.  he tried to take pictures with his camera phone, but they didn't come out.  i'm sure he would not mind telling you what he saw in more detail.  thanks for all you do.
sincerely,
diane gatley
content.summary: Triangular object appeared in the sky with lights about 80 ft up, no sound, about 40 ft wide, hovered, then was accompanied by a darting sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
me and a buddy had been visiting girlfriends in canada and then stopped to see some other friends near spokane for a few hours before we headed home to seattle.
 
  it was a clear night, not a car on the road but us. we were heading west up stevens pass near the summit just after the road splits into 2 lanes at approx. 4am in the morning.

 my buddy was driving my 1971 vw baja bug, i was riding shotgun. we had just tuned up the car before we left canada, it was running great. the car was bright orange with a yellow starsky and hutch type stripe over the top and down the side.
 
 the car started to spit and sputter and cough as we saw some bright lights through the trees, off to our right. our first impression was it may be a helicopter, until we realized that it would probably be pretty difficult for any aircraft to manuever between the mountains like that day or night, and why is the car starting to run lousy? 

 we realized that the craft was going the same speed as us and it was glowing like neon exactly the same colors as my car, almost as if it was trying to communicate with us. there was a break in the trees and we saw the whole thing.Yep, it was following right next to us. we felt like we had little control of the situation.

 whatever this thing was, seemed to be shaped exactly like an old fashioned box kite. it had 2 ends and a frame. it even seemed to have criss cross support bows like a box kite. it was flying very low and appeared to have no windows and made no sounds or exhaust. 

 i am not sure how big this thing was but i would guess it was at least bigger than a train car but most likely 50 to 100 times bigger. it appeared to be very close to us as it followed us along the highway. 

 the car was starting to run worse and worse. i rolled my window down to see if i could hear it. it seemed to have no sound coming from it. it was silent. the car then died and my buddy coasted the car to the shoulder. 

 we were pretty scared at this point. we looked at each other and said, "well, lets go see what this thing is". i remember opening the door and stepping out of the car to look at this thing. when i got out, it had disappeared. it vanished. no smoke nothing, just gone.

 we looked around for a minute but couldn't see it anywhere.Pretty scared, we got back into the car, it started right up and was running perfectly.

 as we drove off, we kept looking for it. i did see it again it was up near the top of the mountain and was glowing blue with yellow outline this time as it went over the mountain out of sight.

 we don't recall being abducted or recall any time lost.

 i enjoy watching ufo shows in hopes to see something like what we saw. they always seem to be disc shaped or v shaped on those shows or in photos.

 i would be very interested in hearing about other encounters such as ours. i am wondering if  sightings of a box kite shaped ufo is rare. are they different than others? i don't believe what we saw was of this world.

 thanks!
content.summary: The ufo was shaped like an old fashioned box kite. glowing orange and yellow. it made my car stall.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gone to bed, my girlfriend was asleep at the time next to me. it was at about 1:40am wednesday morning (20/08/2008), weather was quite overcast but the moon was shining through in places.

i like to keep the curtains open so i can look at the sky as i drift off to sleep. as i was looking out the window i spotted a bright, fast moving ball of light, same sort of intensity as an aircrafts headlamps/landing lights when it faces you if you will. 

 at first i thought it was just a fast moving jet aircraft, it remained on a straight trajectory, though its speed was impressive. it then suddenly (but not instantly) changed its course and started flying about in circles and loops, darting in and out of the cloud cover, still maintaining an impressive amount of speed for such hard turns. the object appeared as a ball of light, no flashing lights that i could see or other colours coming through.

after about 30 seconds or so of observing the object in awe, i tried to go for my phone camera, but it had already gone by the time i got it. my girlfriend was awoken by my excited reactions, but didn't believe me. it nonetheless spooked her because of how i was acting and for the next 10-15 mins, she was watching the sky herself while i slowly started drifting to sleep.

a sudden hitch of breath came from my girlfriend and i turned back to see the object had returned. this time it did no fanciful maneuvers, but hovered around the clouds for a few seconds before it sped off again at impressive speeds into the distance towards the general direction of raf benson.

this hugely disturbed my girlfriend i have to say. she tried to convince me it was just a bird, but i didn't believe she believed that explanation herself, she was really quite scared at what she saw and just lay there watching the skies for about half an hour before she finally fell asleep again. this morning when i tried to talk about it, she just got upset and didn't want to talk about it.

this is my first 'ufo' sighting and my feelings on the matter has often been its most likely human made, super secret aircraft. it did not behave like any aircraft i'm currently aware of and it most certaintly wasn't a bird. it did not behave in a manner of something falling to the earth either (meteor, satellite etc), but in a controlled manner at cloud level.

personally i found this to be an amazing experience for me. even though the possibility exists that this can be mundanely explained, i felt such a rush of adrenaline and combination of emotional reactions from fear, anxiety to sheer excitement at what i saw. i have often seen videos of similar objects and wanted to see one for myself to make my own judgements....
content.summary: Very fast moving bright light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was staying at my parents house the day before thanksgiving, i just got into bed when i started to hear a buzzing sound kinda in my head. i started to meditate on this sound and it became more intense, and the dogs outside started to bark. out of no where i heard a voice tell me to get dressed and go outside, i continued to lay there and the voice said again go outside!I get up with this weird urgency and run outside, i'm looking everywhere and i see nothing. i cant explain the feeling that was going through my body, it was the most intense feeling of fight or flight. after about 3 minutes of looking around i figured i was crazy and began to walk inside because it was so damn cold out. as i was walking into my door, something was drawing my head to a section of the sky. as i looked there was a flashing light, it was going from green to red to white and changing between these colors behind a tree. the tree was about 50 yrds away across the street, but you could tell the object was super far in the distance, and super high. at first i thought it was a plane, but i watched over 20 minutes about 5-6 planes fly across the full span of the sky. this object stayed in the same spot, and it wasn't a constant light or star there was a flicker to it, i couldn't even believe it and i was telling my self it was just a star. i placed the object behind a branch of a tree to hide it from my vision when i was surprised to see that it was clearly blinking, you could tell because the branch was hiding the bright main mass but the surrounding light leaking out behind the branch was cleanly blinking between green, red and white. my knee's were trembling throughout this whole experience, and the weirdest thing happened. i started to get really emotional, my knee's were trembling and i found my self crying and tearing for no apparent reason, and it wasn't a scared cry i cant explain it, it was a good thing. i'm not jumping to conclusions saying i know for sure i saw a ufo or what ever, but all i know is, i know my body. the way my body acted towards what ever this event was amazed me and made me feel like there was something to this.
content.summary: Was told to go outside, saw green, red and white lights, felt emotional.

content.detailedDescription:
I was cycling home and spotted a bright hite light in the sky, too bright to be a star or a planet.  it remained unmoving.  it was approx. 5pm so it was dark, though it appeared before any other stars in the sky.

i watched it for over 30 mintutes until i noticed a red stream like cloud coming from the sea heading directly towards it. the stream was almost vertical. it moved fairly slowly, but obviously it must have been much faster if the light was very high altitude. it probably took 30 seconds or so for the red stream to reach the light...It came very close but went slightly past it and carried on moving up until i couldn't see it anymore.

anyway, i observed the light as long as i could until cloud coverage prevented me from seeing it anymore.

i keep looking out my window, but the clouds are too dense to see anything.

i swear to god...Something fired at this light in the sky.
content.summary: Bright light in sky, followed by red light shot up at it, which went past it.

content.detailedDescription: I am just now reporting these sightings because i just learnd there is a place to do so.The number of sightings took place over a period of about two months.The majority of the sightings were the same with a few that were extrordinary.They would always start out as the first star in the sky,but they were'nt.Once the transition from twilight to darkness happened everything changed.Looking through the scope of my hunting rifle{the only optical inhancement i had}it changed completely.I could see that there was a red center light with blue,green,and yellow lights rotating around the center.It would then drop in a 90degree angle over a 1-2 hour period.What threw me off was that it moved faster than stars but slower than aircraft.These were the average that me and a friend saw every night for weeks,then things changed.One night i saw one that was moving very fast.It changed from lights to a decending fireball{like a meteor} then back to lights.From my house you could see the orange glow of lights from pelican bay prison through the redwood trees.One night my friend and i saw one stationary very high.It then shot a huge green laser beem directly into the prison.Those two sightings were the most amazing things i have ever seen.I was not a believer before then but you can bet i am now.Over a two month period my friend and i must have seen at the very least two dozen u.F.O.S. wich leads me to believe this is a hot spot. this changed my life forever i now don't think that all u.F.O. sighters are just crazy or looking for attention.Thank you for your time and work in the persuit of the truth.
content.summary: Dozens of sightings

content.detailedDescription: I am just now reporting these sightings because i just learnd there is a place to do so.The number of sightings took place over a period of about two months.The majority of the sightings were the same with a few that were extrordinary.They would always start out as the first star in the sky,but they were'nt.Once the transition from twilight to darkness happened everything changed.Looking through the scope of my hunting rifle{the only optical inhancement i had}it changed completely.I could see that there was a red center light with blue,green,and yellow lights rotating around the center.It would then drop in a 90degree angle over a 1-2 hour period.What threw me off was that it moved faster than stars but slower than aircraft.These were the average that me and a friend saw every night for weeks,then things changed.One night i saw one that was moving very fast.It changed from lights to a decending fireball{like a meteor} then back to lights.From my house you could see the orange glow of lights from pelican bay prison through the redwood trees.One night my friend and i saw one stationary very high.It then shot a huge green laser beem directly into the prison.Those two sightings were the most amazing things i have ever seen.I was not a believer before then but you can bet i am now.Over a two month period my friend and i must have seen at the very least two dozen u.F.O.S. wich leads me to believe this is a hot spot. this changed my life forever i now don't think that all u.F.O. sighters are just crazy or looking for attention.Thank you for your time and work in the persuit of the truth.
content.summary: Dozens of sightings.

content.detailedDescription: I am a strong believer in ufo's.  i was working with 3 other men repairing a broken water main . i was just looking up in the sky and noticed 2 silver acorn looking objects hovering over us, they were at a 45 degree angle from one another and move symetrically together,they stayed at the same angle at all times and moved in a circle around us, i would say they were about 2000 ft above us. i told the 3 men what i was watching,2 guys said it was balloons, the other was in awe.If they were ballons they would have floated away and woulnt stay in unison at all times. as we continued to watch, they remained at the 45 degree angle stopped, hovered over us, and then rose straight upuntil we lost sight,
content.summary: 2 separate objects hovering overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
over the years i have witnessed this type of event at different times of night and early morning. this particular time i recorded pertinent information.
 monday night i stepped outside and as in the past expeiences noticed a star increasing in magnitude until it was brighter than any around. it appears to be stationary but over time i've found that is not the case. the object is entering the atmosphere at a calculated angle of attack and the glow is its shielding which is metallic as the glow is a brilliant white yellow. the object then assumes a more level flight path and begins a rapid cooling phase from the yellow color through the reds and visually fading as it travels.
 there is no noise when this occurs and no other aircraft in the general area below it.
 the flight paths do change and i have not noticed any timing pattern. it is purely chance to see it. the predominate entry patten is from the south- southeast to the north- northeast.
 at the time of this siting my position as fixed to within 25' by gps is as follows: n.30-30.194' w. 88-57.03'.
            facing south visual reference was 179 degr. up angle from the horizon was 80 degr. elevation. the estimated speed was 1000 knts on a heading of 180 degr.
 the number of times i have seen this leads me to believe these events are by craft under some form of intelligent control and are of some program not known to the public. there is no notice of shuttle or capsule re-entrys on the news.
content.summary: Atmospheric entry event.

content.detailedDescription: At the time i was driving for a u s postal contractor, comming back from monticello fl.  i was about 3 miles west of clarksville on sr 20, i noticed a flash of low intensity light, orange in color, just above the tree tops. while driving i concentraited on where i had last seen the light and it flashed again, the light lasted about 2 to 3 tenths of a second on each duration. i noticed that each time the light came on it moved westward about 50 to 100 feet or so. i watched it for about a minute until i drove past it's position. there was no sound that i could hear as the engine of my truck was loud. the lights looked exactly like  :u: it looked like a large u with two lights on each side of the u. i was not afraid i was facinated by the lights. the following night i saw the lights again in almost the same spot but more westward on sr 20. the third night i saw it i was on my way to my house and i saw it across a field about a mile from my home.
content.summary: While driving on sr 20 i noticed some lights at just above treetop level.

content.detailedDescription:
Not even sure if it should be considered a typical ufo event or a paranormal event ...I've not read about anything like it!! it took me quite sometime before i would talk about it and only would then because there was a credible witness.

am not certain of the exact date or time..It was a year or two after i retired,  probably 1983 0r 1984.  it occured during the day while wife was at work and and i was home alone.  i was reading in my basement with my left side facing to a row of windows.  location was above a steep wooded cliff that descended to the coal river.  i was suddenly bothered by a crunching feeling in the back of my neck...On looking up there was a globe about the size of a tennis ball...Maybe a little larger.  floating very slowly past me and toward the closed windows.  the globe consisted of a cluster of smaller translucent globes that were about the size of salmon eggs.  the smaller globes were undulating around each other as the larger (ufo ..Unidentified floating object) slowly drifted towards the windows..I reached out to grab it but was stopped by a powerful feeling of dread...Almost like a command not to touch the object!!  before reaching the window the object faded from my sight...But apparantly not from my dogs vision ( the witness)...At this point i noticed that he was intenly and curiously watching something i could not see...As he watched his neck was suddenly twisted like a corkscrew and he collapsed.  i thought he was dead...But in a few seconds he revived and seemed to be all right...The event was over.  if my dog had not been so affected i would never have mentioned the incident because of fear of ridicule..In fact at first i thought i might have been halucinating..The entire event lasted less than a minute and left me shaken.
content.summary: Came within  a foot or two of a floating globe.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside smoking when i noticed what appeared to be a black line in the northeastern sky moving in a staight line.  from my vantage point it appeared to be over the delaware river or the eastern edge of bucks county, pennsylvania.  it was moving faster than the airliners that fly overhead and appeared to be close to the same altitude.  as it got opposite me it turned on edge and i could see that it was rectangle shaped.  it appeared to be black in color.  i didn't see any lights openings or attachments.  it looked like a big black door several hundred feet in length.  as i watched it suddenly disappeared as if it was switched off.  the sky was overcast but it didn't slip between the clouds.  it just disappeared.  i went in the house to check on the time and it was 2:27pm.

i watched  the news on tv and looked for reports of what i had seen in the newspapers for a few days and didn't see anything so i didn't report it to anyone.  i've only told close members of my family and they look at me whith some skepticism.  as large as the object appeared, somebody else must have seen it.  i would like to know if you have any other reports of this incident.
content.summary: Unknown object in rapid flight over western edge of new jersey.

content.detailedDescription: While working as a patrol sergeant with a municipal police police department in luzerne county pa, i was patroling a rural cemetery checking for underage drinking. while out of my car, i heard a loud noise and observed a large bright round object literally take off from a mountain side behind the cemetery. about 10 minutes later i received a call from our county dispatcher that a multiple vehicle accident occured on rt. 309, north bound lane. i proceeded to the accident scene and arrived in about 5 minutes. i left my vehicle and while walking towards the first crashed car i was approached by the operator of the same. he said, "dont worry about me, you better check the big truck that was coming down the wrong side of the road and went into the creek below." i immediately noticed small trees and brush pushed almost flat showing the appearance that something went down to the creek. i immediately walked to the creek below. nothing was found. after studying the chain of events it appears that the bright lighted object i witnessed leaving the cemetery did indeed fly from the cemetery down the cut in the mountain, down the wrong side of the highway rt 309 and cause the crash. i now reside in florida and did not report the cemetery incident since i was concerned about my career. i hit 60 last week and will take about it, but still do not wish to go public with my story since i continue to work in law enforcement as a forensic drug lab supervisor.  i testify in court and have a concern about redicule and my credibility.
content.summary: Observed bright lited objected fly off and cause  atraffic crash

content.detailedDescription:
I work for a pizza place in st charles mo. on a delivery i saw two objects in the horizon. when i pulled onto the street near the home, the lights circled around each other and then went drifted away from each other.
i was in panic, i stopped at an overpass and noticed there were 4 objects just floating in the sky. i went back to work and told my manager. we both went outside and saw several objects just floating in the sky. then, we saw many unknown aircraft flying around. most of the were very quiet. they had the shape of f-4's. one of them looked like a 737 but had engines like a f-15. they flew over us at about 1000 feet or less. they flew around the lights for 20 minutes.  the lights just vanished and then the planes just flew away. the planes went east very fast,east of st charles is scott afb. my manager brian was a witness and can prove all statements are true. we both think it was ufo's. the planes we saw were not normal aircraft. this can be confirmed by both of us.

the lights flashed white, yellow and red. they floated side to side. they were seen to the east of st charles mo near the airport. total numbers of light seen was 4. when it all stared they moved in ways no human aircraft can move.

i knew at first sight that it was a normal aircraft. i felt very scared and excited. the whole situation made me really nervous. i knew something was not right. i knew the aircraft i saw were not right. i studied aviation and all this did not make any sense.
content.summary: Ufos and military aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home down stevens creek blvd. as i reached the bottom of a hill, straight ahead of me was a black military helicopter. i could see there was something "floating" in front of it. as i got closer i could tell it was a black sphere approximately 5 feet in diameter. the helicopter and the sphere were "face to face". just as i realized what i was seeing the black sphere took off in a northerly direction towards moffett field naval airbase. the helicopter took off in pursuit and by the time i got around the corner both were gone and completely out of site.

at first i thought the object was a bird. but as i got closer i could see an almost raised metal band around it. the object seemed to hover in a waving sort of motion. there were no lights on it that i could see. it was in the middle of the day. for those that might say it was the setting sun, since when is the sun black, 5 feet in diameter and takes off in a northerly direction with a black military helicopter chasing it? this was no balloon, flare or any other object that the skeptics tend to attach to most ufos. 

i am very familiar with all kinds of military and civilian aircract. i grew up around planes my whole life. i'm what you'd call an aircraft enthusiast. this was in no way a conventional aircraft. there was no visible propulsion and no wings whatsoever. 

it didn't strike me as an "occupied" vehicle. it seemed like it was being controlled remotely and intelligently.
content.summary: Black military helicopter chasing black spherical ball.

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw this object when i was walking from my house to my garage. i live in toledo ohio. i call it a blinker because that is what it does... it blinks in and out and seems to be moving, but also seems very far away... i have gotten some very interesting pictures at different times of the night and year of it... it may just be a satelite or something, but it is much brighter and much larger than any star i have ever seen.  to the naked eye, it flashes different colors, but when you take a picture, you can see that it is moving erratically. in fact i got out my telescope and couldn't seem to even keep it in the frame.  if anyone has a theory on what this might be, please let me know.  whatever it is, it seems to be covering a lot of ground, very quickly and very far away.  i see it a lot, not always in the same spot.  usually i catch it when i am outside getting some fresh air.  i stood on my picnic table to get several of the shots, and also tried to get the fence line and the neighbors house to give perspective, eventhough it is dark out.  i always have my eye to the skyline so it really stuck out to me.  
i thought if it was a ufo, it is very far away. it never seems to come toward me, just moves very erratically.  the pictures attached are from a canon powershot digital camera fully zoomed in.  i don't know what setting it was on, i just grabbed the camera and started shooting!  i have several more pictures of this sighting as well as another from another night. i never lost sight of the object, just had to go back inside.
content.summary: Orbital moving blinker... almost looked like a crazy atom or something.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife used to sit outside with the neighbors in the evenings till we moved . at approximately 10:05 pm my daughter came in to tell me that her mom had saw a ufo , i was like whatever . if she saw a ufo she would come in to tell me herself . so sure enough about 10 to 15 minutes later she came in saying she saw ufo and now jets were flying all over the place .
   so i went outside and saw about 5 to 10 jets flying all over the place 
they soon started dropping flares in the area where my wife had saw the object . this was seen by about 6 adults and 4 or 5 children my wife wasn't shaken at all by the ufo , but the jets had scared her . she said when she saw it it was like she had always known . this is her second time seeing one , the other was in milwaukee in 2007 . 
   the neighbors on the other hand were clearly shaken by what they had seen. they all said that the jets that were dropping the flares was not what they had just witnessed . they described it as being a soft ball sized like fire ball that popped up then disappeared then popped up again in a different location . it lasted about 15 minutes till the jets showed up . they said that the ufo was much bigger than the flares that were being dropped by the jets .
    while the jets were flying all over i was looking all over the sky cause i wanted to see what they had . i looked straight up and i saw what looked like a star moving directly above me but it was real far away . i pointed it out to my wife she saw it to . it was moving straight , then it like pulsed and disappeared . by pulsed i mean it had the star like light then an outer light not as bright around it kind of like a fried egg the yolk being the brighter light it was weird . i'm not sure if what i saw was a ufo , but ive never seen anything like it before .
      i didnt go outside to get pictures of the fire ball that they saw , but i did take pictures of the jets dropping the flares .
   the reason why i didnt report this to you guys sooner is i didnt know about this site . i did however report it to this guy http://www.Ufoguy.Com on friday, july 25, 2008 at 2:55 pm i still have the e-mail in my inbox the story is on his web page . we werent the only people to see it that day . bill kind of took what i said out of context and said my pics were of ufo's i didnt like that to much . 
     you have to zoom in on the photo because my camera isnt the best .
content.summary: Ufo followed by jets dropping flares .

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were on our way out going to friendly's when i looked to the south and saw two bright lights. at first i didn't think much of them but then i realized i saw these lights four days before driving home from a movie. this time i show them to my family and they told me i was crazy and that they were just airplanes. but they were way too bright to be airplanes and they were staitionary. i tried to take a picture with my mom's phone but it didn't turn out too well. as we were driving south the lights seemed to get brighter. i saw these lights for about 15 minutes, but when i came out of friendly's they were gone again. my family was starting to think i'm not soo crazy. this experience is just like my last... if you've had an experience similar to this contact me at brightlightsoverboston@gmial.Com. these lights had a possible disk shape to them and were about 3 miles away. wierd... i looked it up on a star chart and they were not stars...
content.summary: Second sighting of 2 wierd bright lights in four days! if you have any info. contact me at brightlightsoverboston@gmail.Com.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to my maibox and heard a jet over my house coming maybe from o'hare. i love to fly and looked up to enjoy its lights. i estimate the plane's altitude at 10,000 feet going east/north east. as i was observing the jet, a huge triangle shaped object flew over my head toward a  more eastern direction. in comparing the altitude of the plane to the triangle, i estimate the triangle flying at about 4,000 feet lower than the jet at about 45 degrees angle, over my house and coming from behind me.  the triangle went over and passed over very fast however, i was able to see a black contour and round, opaque dark red lights imbedded in its bottom. there was no noise, and it flew into a few flimsy clouds.  when that happened, the red lights became dull, the craft tilted left and it disappeared on a easterly direction. i was breathless. in my life i have seen other ufo's as i worked, before teaching at the local college with virgil staff in california and did the nightly news for a bilingual station in san francisco.  i never saw anything so big nor in a triangular shape, flying so low and being so big.  i don't know if this can help you find out if last night (november 25), other people saw it also. i want to add that the craft had about 4 red lights on each side, 1 on the apex and about 3 on the base of the triangle.
please feel free to contact me at my home phone any evening.  during the day i usually have classes (i teach french and spanish) back to back.
it was a very exciting experience, no fear only awe and curiosity of course. thank you for reading this report.

p.S. i estimate the whole experience lasted no longer than 8 seconds.
content.summary: Semi-clear evening. looked at ski. saw only outline of craft, black. bottom lights. non-reflective and non-blinking, round and dark red. opaque. app. size: 2 football fields.  app. altitude: 6,000 feet

content.detailedDescription:
I was in north denver waiting for the bus after work.

two twinkling objects were seen at two different times within five minutes far above the western horizon.  they were either flying further west or were dropping altitude, but both floated down several degrees in vision while seeming to expand and contract, and then finally they disappeared.  

i mightve thought they were jets if it werent for the fact that they left no trail of exhaust.  they both simply appeared in the sky and dropped down on the vertical plane of vision while changing shape and floating down, kind of like a feather does.  the first one disappeared outright, just fading out of the sky.  i may have lost sight of the second one only because it flew further west(?) behind a cloud.  

a few minutes after the sighting, a jet with a short stream was seen flying to where the objects were spotted in the sky.  i lost sight of it when it disappeared behind the same cloud as the ufo.  

the experience intrigued and frightened me.
content.summary: Two twinkling, moving ufos sighted in western sky; chased by a jet.

content.detailedDescription: 1st viewer was outside.  saw the ufo.  called for 2nd viewer.  second viewer saw the streak (tail) of the ufo disappearing.  appeared to be gliding at a high speed.  1st viewer was just looking up at the night sky.  was uncertain what the object was at first.  object moved (streaked) away at a very high rate of speed.
content.summary: White triangle.  moved away at high speed.  2nd observer saw streak.  flying lower than a typical jet.

content.detailedDescription: On october 9, 2008, while watching the 6:00 pm evening news out of bryan/college station, the weatherman said that the space station would be flying over our area around 8:00 pm.  at 7:55 pm, my husband and i went outside to our backyard and waited for the space station.  we watched it fly from the north to the east towards houston.  we watched for about 5 minutes until we could not see it anymore.  at that time, we both turn around to the wnw and see an object flying slowing.  at first we thought it was some military aircraft tracking the space station, but the more we watched it, it didn't look or sound like any aircraft.  in fact, there was no sound at all.  it was triangular shaped with 6 orange lights that were not blinking but with a steady glow.  there were 2 circular lights in each corner.  we knew that it wasn't an aircraft, because there were airplanes flying overhead from houston, and they are very distince with their flashing lights and engine sounds.  we couldn't believe our eyes.  my husband, who is an avid ufo believer, was yelling that he told me so, that they were real!!  i was saying "oh my god" over and over.  then, it started moving towards the north, but it never turned or angled in any way.  we could see the triangle shape with the 6 lights the whole time it moved away from us.  it was moving at a moderate speed.  at the same time, my husband is calling my sister to tell her what we are seeing and she suggests i contact the news station to see if anyone else is going to report the sighting.  my husband used his cell phone camera to take a picture, but it was quite a distance away at that point.  i called the news hotline, but they did not receive any reports.  i, then emailed the meterologist, bob french, on october 9, 2008 at approx. 8:14 pm to see if he had heard of any reports of strange aircraft, or if he knew if there were any military aircraft in the area.  he responded on october 10, that he had not heard of anything unusual in our area.  my husband and i were shocked, excited, frantic, and so many other emotions.  my husband and i truly believe we saw a ufo, unless you can disprove what we saw.  unfortunately, the picture he took on his cell phone, only shows a small glowing dot.
content.summary: Triangle shape with 6 orange lights-2 lights in each corner with steady glow.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home through a neighborhood on hot and sunny summer afternoon going about 20-25 mph.  out of the corner of my eye i saw something gliding in the air at the edge of the neighborhood near a pond/swamp and field.  i immediately thought(and still wonder if)it was a kite, but recognized as i focused that it was a few individual non-shining,metallic spheres that were about the size of a pilates/exercise ball each.  they were in a flat triangle formation, which did not change/falter the entire time i saw it.  the object/s was in constant motion. it was about 15 ft. high when i first noticed it and glided up near the side of a house and over the roof when i lost visual for a sec. because it was behind the house.  it then emerged from behind the house at about 25-30 ft.(high enough to go over a 2 story roof). it continued to glide towards the field which went up a shallow slope going northwest.  i watched it till it was out of view from going up and over this hill.  it glided very slowly(10-15 mph) and gracefully(like a bird enjoying the wind) the whole time. the speed was consistent/ no deviations. there was no sound.

a side note:
   my mom was boating on my lake which is southeast from this sighting and said she saw "something" slowly gliding towards where i was(northwest) at the time of this sighting.  she didn't elaborate too much.  all she said was that it was metal, strange, and queit.

this happened around 4:30 p.M. in august.
if it was a kite that i saw, the person holding the strings would of had to run through and over the field where this object glided over and out of sight.  a wild field full of cattails and other thick vegetation.
content.summary: No-shine metal spheres in a triangle formation gliding.

content.detailedDescription: Flashing red, blue, white, green, and yellow. slowly and quickly zooming back and forth in the sky. as i was walking outside to check on my horses i looked up and saw flashing lights in the distance. i watched it for a while, then looked back minutes later and the same one was still there. at one time there were two near each other. i thought they were planes but the same ones were moving back and forth in the sky, and had two different obvious speeds, one very fast, and then very slow. i went back inside and soon lost interest and lost sight. i didn't have a camera on me.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing many colors, zooming back and forth in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen this object several times through out the past few months here in athens, oh.  i first noticed it when i was sitting on my porch smoking a cigarette late one night during the summer.  at first i thought it was just an extremely bright star until i noticed it was moving and the unusual coloring.  it is a large lits, it blinks multiple colors (blue, orange, red and purple) and usually slowly ascends straight up until it disappears.  sometimes it would simply accelerate at great speeds.  the first few times i saw the light it was directly over bong hill.  which is maybe half a mile away from my house across highway 33/50.   i often saw it over the hills across the hocking river as i walked to work on the bike path that runs parrallel with the hocking river.  i can not make out any discernable craft due to the brightness of the light it projects.  i worked 3rd shift so it was usually dark out.  heck, i cant even be sure the light is actually attached to a craft of any sort or if the light is the craft itself.  this area seems to be getting an influx of unusual aerial activity.  two friends of mine saw an unusally bright light descend at great speeds as they drove to mcconnelsville, oh.  i have heard others tell similar stories as well.  i think we may have an upcoming ufo flap considering the rise in sightings nationwide.
content.summary: A recurring large multi-colored light spotted several times by myself and a few others.  rises extremely slow and then will jet away.
